title: 【图片】热带岛屿“The Mederfes Island”！
author: 豪哥2012
txt_content:
Welcome to the Rcarft!

    Do you tired of the invariable snow mountain map?
Maybe you will like the similar to the 'Crysis' map.
What could be better than a free construction of tropical island more exciting?
So Rsir especially like 'Tropico' classmates made such a map.
Want you like it : ) .











File will be released soon
Don't try so hard

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content: 我加这些分是默认你发存档了，别忘了之后补上，我就不用回来了。。

replies.author: dason46
replies.txt_content:
歡迎的Rcarft！


    你厭倦了不變的雪山地圖嗎？

也許你會喜歡的“孤島危機”地圖。

有什麼能比一個免費的熱帶島嶼的建設，更令人興奮的呢？

所以RSIR特別喜歡“TROPICO的同學提出了這樣的地圖。

希望你喜歡它）。    ??....

replies.author: 冥王星人
replies.txt_content: 拿掉光影一看，总觉得没什么。

replies.author: 我爱你wy
replies.txt_content: 很好看呢!但是  怎么下载MOD  是太亮了么？
